author: USA TODAY, William Cummings, USA TODAY
title: 'This is going to be our Pearl Harbor': Surgeon General warns USA facing worst week of coronavirus outbreak
description: "This is going to be the hardest and the saddest week of most Americans’ lives," Surgeon General Jerome Adams  warned Sunday.
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci and Vice President Mike Pence have emotional words for the health care workers on the front lines of the coronavirus battle.
USA TODAY
Surgeon General Jerome Adams said the coronavirus pandemic rivals some of the darkest moments in U.S. hi… [+3939 chars]
